blendOperationToWebGL.name: blendOperationToWebGL
blendOperationToWebGL.comment: Converts the lithium_ion/lithium_graphics.BlendOperation enumeration to its WebGL value.

class.name: Viewport
class.preview: The window dimensions of a render-target surface onto which a 3D volume projects.

class.name: VertexList
class.preview: Provides access to modify vertex data.

class.name: VertexElementUsage
class.preview: Defines usage for the vertex elements.

class.name: VertexElementFormat
class.preview: Defines vertex element formats.

class.name: VertexElement
class.preview: Defines input vertex data to the pipeline.

class.name: VertexDeclaration
class.preview: Defines per-vertex data.

class.name: VertexBuffer
class.preview: Represents a list of vertices.

class.name: TextureFilter
class.preview: Defines filtering types during texture sampling.

class.name: TextureAddressMode
class.preview: Defines modes for addressing texels using texture coordinates outside of the typical range of 0.0 to 1.0.

class.name: SurfaceFormat
class.preview: Defines various types of surface formats.

class.name: StencilOperation
class.preview: Defines stencil buffer operations.

class.name: SamplerState
class.preview: Contains sampler state, which determines how to sample texture data.

class.name: ResourceDestroyedEvent
class.preview: An event for when a lithium_ion/lithium_graphics.GraphicsResource is destroyed.

class.name: ResourceCreatedEvent
class.preview: An event for when a lithium_ion/lithium_graphics.GraphicsResource is created.

class.name: RenderingErrorEvent
class.preview: An event for when an error occurs during rendering.

class.name: RasterizerState
class.preview: Determines how to convert vector data (shapes) into raster data (pixels).

class.name: PrimitiveType
class.preview: Defines how vertex data is ordered.

class.name: IndexElementSize
class.preview: Defines the size of an element of an index buffer.

class.name: IndexBuffer
class.preview: Describes the rendering order of the vertices in a vertex buffer.

class.name: GraphicsResource
class.preview: Base class for resources allocated from the lithium_ion/lithium_graphics.GraphicsDevice.

class.name: GraphicsDeviceExtensions
class.preview: Collects the extensions available within WebGL.

class.name: GraphicsDeviceConfig
class.preview: Specifies the configuration of the lithium_ion/lithium_graphics.GraphicsDevice.

class.name: GraphicsDeviceCapabilities
class.preview: Allows the querying of the capabilities of the lithium_ion/lithium_graphics.GraphicsDevice.

class.name: GraphicsDevice
class.preview: Handles creation of graphics resources, and context creation.

class.name: GraphicsContext
class.preview: The lithium_ion/lithium_graphics.GraphicsContext configures the GPU pipeline and executes draw commands.

class.name: FrontFace
class.preview: Defines the winding used to determine whether a triangle is front or back facing.

class.name: EffectBuilder
class.preview: Allows the programmatic creation of lithium_ion/lithium_graphics.Effects.

class.name: DepthStencilState
class.preview: Contains depth-stencil state for the device.

class.name: DebugRenderingContext
class.preview: A debug implementation of the lithium_ion/lithium_graphics.RenderingContext.

class.name: CullMode
class.preview: Indicates whether triangles facing a particular direction are drawn.

class.name: CubeMapFace
class.preview: Defines the faces of a cube map in the lithium_ion/lithium_graphics.TextureCube class type.

class.name: ColorChannel
class.preview: The color channels.

class.name: CompareFunction
class.preview: Defines comparison functions that can be chosen for stencil, or depth-buffer tests.

class.name: BufferUsage
class.preview: Defines the usage of a buffer.

class.name: BlendState
class.preview: Contains blend state for the pipeline.

class.name: BlendOperation
class.preview: Defines how to combine a source color with the destination color.

class.name: Blend
class.preview: Defines color blending factors.
